name: com.android.shell.BugreportProgressService
description: Service used to trigger system bugreports. The workflow uses Bugreport API(@code BugreportManager) and is as follows: System apps like Settings or SysUI broadcasts @code BUGREPORT_REQUESTED. BugreportRequestedReceiver receives the intent and delegates it to this service. This service calls startBugreport() and passes in local file descriptors to receive bugreport artifacts.
